THIS GAME IS STILL IN ALPHA

Raise The Dead is a zombie experimentation game. Perform research and experiments on zombies. Craft potions. Grow various plants and upgrade your equipment. Your ultimate goal is to find a cure to the zombie outbreak.

Features:

- Capture zombies and place them in cells.
- Synthesize various potions.
- Use potions to perform experiments on zombies.
- Research and develop new upgrades, potions and tech.
- Farm plants.
- Play around with the cutest of zombies.
